official_title: Still Climbin': A Randomized Controlled Trial to Improve Coping, Medical Mistrust, and Healthcare Engagement Among Black Sexual Minority Men
inclusion_criteria:
* 18 years of age or older
* Biologically male at birth
* Identify as male
* Self-identify as a Black/African American
* Report having sex with men in the past 24 months
* Anticipate being in Los Angeles County and available for the next 12 months to attend study visits
* Able to interact and communicate in written and spoken English.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Unwilling/Unable to provide informed consent
* Cisgender women
* Transgender women
* Transgender men
